title: It's so easy
creator_credit: Donald Crombie, John Martin-Jones and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Deals with the basic rules of safety at sea. Emphasises the need to be aware of the dangers. Always check gear, don’t overload, carry a radio for any warning of weather change, state destination before departing, and obey the rules of the “water road”. Outlines technique of survival swimming.
